name: node-fetch-npm

1.0.0.name: node-fetch-npm
1.0.0.description: An npm cli-oriented fork of the excellent node-fetch

scripts.report: nyc --reporter lcov --reporter text mocha -R spec test/test.js
scripts.coverage: nyc --reporter json --reporter text mocha -R spec test/test.js && codecov -f coverage/coverage-final.json
scripts.update-coc: weallbehave -o . && git add CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md && git commit -m 'docs(coc): updated CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md'
scripts.update-contrib: weallcontribute -o . && git add CONTRIBUTING.md && git commit -m 'docs(contributing): updated CONTRIBUTING.md'
